question: Which state government has decided to replicate Tamil Nadu model of Micro Composting Centre (MCC)?
explanation: As part of its \'Swachha Odisha Sustha Odisha\' campaign, the Odisha Government has decided to replicate Tamil Nadu model of Micro Composting Centre (MCC) for proper segregation and management of wet waste. The Solid waste management is a cause of concern for urban local bodies (ULBs) due to a rapid urbanisation.
